publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1125# Mr Lloyd Quinan: Autistic Spectrum Disorder Provision-That the Parliament notes that the incidence of autistic spectrum disorder has rapidly increased in the last ten years; further notes the challenge faced by parents, carers and organisations such as Strathclyde Autistic Society regarding the lack of appropriate provision, and urges rapid action to address and rectify the current situation.

S1M-1125# Autistic Spectrum Disorder Provision (lodged on 23 August 2000) Michael Russell*, Bruce Crawford*, Mrs Margaret Ewing*, Christine Grahame*, Shona Robison*, Fergus Ewing*, Mr Gil Paterson*, Mr Adam Ingram*, Mr Kenny MacAskill*, Michael Matheson*, Dorothy-Grace Elder*

S1M-1125# Mr Lloyd Quinan: Autistic Spectrum Disorder Provision-That the Parliament notes that the incidence of autistic spectrum disorder has rapidly increased in the last ten years; further notes the challenge faced by parents, carers and organisations such as Strathclyde Autistic Society regarding the lack of appropriate provision, and urges rapid action to address and rectify the current situation. Supported by: Michael Russell, Bruce Crawford, Mrs Margaret Ewing, Christine Grahame, Shona Robison, Fergus Ewing, Mr Gil Paterson, Mr Adam Ingram, Mr Kenny MacAskill, Michael Matheson, Dorothy-Grace Elder, Fiona McLeod*
S1M-1125# Autistic Spectrum Disorder Provision (lodged on 23 August 2000) Donald Gorrie*, Andrew Wilson*, Linda Fabiani*
S1M-1125# Autistic Spectrum Disorder Provision (lodged on 23 August 2000) Alex Neil*, Mr Kenneth Gibson*, Cathie Craigie*, Richard Lochhead*

Supported by: Michael Russell, Bruce Crawford, Mrs Margaret Ewing, Christine Grahame, Shona Robison, Fergus Ewing, Mr Gil Paterson, Mr Adam Ingram, Mr Kenny MacAskill, Michael Matheson, Dorothy-Grace Elder, Fiona McLeod, Donald Gorrie, Andrew Wilson, Linda Fabiani, Alex Neil, Mr Kenneth Gibson, Cathie Craigie, Richard Lochhead, Alasdair Morgan*, Ms Sandra White*, Robin Harper*
